NK087(shu)006:1: // mdo dbang gi lag len zab mo bzhugs /
NK087(shu)006:4: lha dang mi yi theg pa'i skabs su rnam par snang mdzad bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:5: na mo b+ha ga wa te bzlas /
NK087(shu)006:8: bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa dbog /nyan thos kyi skabs su sh+aakya thub pa bskyed /
NK087(shu)006:9: gang zag gi bdag med bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:11: gseg shang par bu'i dbang bskur /
NK087(shu)006:12: nyan thos kyi sdom pa dbog /rang rgyal gyi skabs su sh+aakya thub pa dang /
NK087(shu)006:13: mchog chen po bcu gnyis bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:15: rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi dbang bskur /
NK087(shu)006:16: rang rgyal ba'i sdom pa 'bog /byang chub sems dpa'i skabs su yum chen mo bskyed /
NK087(shu)006:19: mdzad pa nyi shu'i dbang bskur /
NK087(shu)006:20: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dbog /kri ya'i skabs su rigs gsum gang rung bskyed /
NK087(shu)006:21: rigs gsum gyi snying po gang rung bzlas /
NK087(shu)006:22: kri ya'i dbang nyi shu rtsa drug bskur /
NK087(shu)006:23: khrus dang gtsang sgra'i sdom pa dbog /yo ga'i skabs su rigs lnga gang rung bskyed /
NK087(shu)006:29: bkra shis drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbang bskur /
NK087(shu)006:30: yo ga'i sdom pa dbog /lha snang la rang bzhin
NK087(shu)006:31: med par sgom du gzhug /ma h+aa yo ga'i skabs
NK087(shu)006:33: zhi ba'i skabs su rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:40: am +aah bo d+hi tsit+ta dz+ny+aa na d+ha tu sa t+wa kod+ha a zhes bzlas /
NK087(shu)006:41: lha dang bdag dbyer med du bsam /
NK087(shu)006:43: ma h+aa yo ga'i dam tshig dbog /khro bo skabs su che mchog bskyed ru lu bzlas /
NK087(shu)006:44: phyi nang sgrub pa gsum gyi dbang bskur /
NK087(shu)006:45: zhi khro dbyer med du bsam /
NK087(shu)006:46: a nu yo ga'i skabs kun tu bzang po bskyed /
NK087(shu)006:47: snying po gra ya dz+ny+aa na bzlas /
NK087(shu)006:48: lha lnga brgya dang brgyad cu'i dbang bskur /
NK087(shu)006:49: a nu rang gi dam tshig dbog /ma 'dres yongs rdzogs kyi gsal 'debs bya /
NK087(shu)006:51: a ti yo ga'i skabs su lha gang bskyed kyang 'dra /
NK087(shu)006:52: rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur /
NK087(shu)006:53: gdams ngag chos thams cad sems su ngo sprad /
NK087(shu)006:54: sems chos nyid du ngo sprad /
NK087(shu)006:55: chos nyid bde ba chen por ngo sprad do //
NK087(shu)006:58: dam tshig ni med pa la sogs bzhi bsrung /
NK087(shu)006:59: gsang dbang gi skabs su lha kun bzang yab yum bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:61: sh+r+ai badz+ra ma h+aa su kha ho /
NK087(shu)006:63: gdams ngag bde la mi rtog pa dbog /sbyor thabs kyi dam tshig dbog /rig 'dzin gyi skabs su /
NK087(shu)006:64: slob dpon dga' rab la sogs pa'i brgyud pa bsam /
NK087(shu)006:66: ma h+aa sha ri ram gi li h+aum zhes bzlas /
NK087(shu)006:67: gdams ngag rig 'dzin gong ma 'od du zhu nas bdag gi lus la thim pas /
NK087(shu)006:68: lus ngag gi sgrib pa thams cad dag par byed par bsam /
NK087(shu)006:69: dam tshig bla ma la mos gus bskyed /
NK087(shu)006:70: rang gi lus kyi bkra shis sgo mngas kyi mchod rten du bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:71: de ni theg pa rim pa dgu ka lam du khyer ba'i dbang gso ba yin no //
NK087(shu)006:73: bla ma rnams la na mo /
NK087(shu)006:74: zhi khro gnyis lam du khyer na /
NK087(shu)006:78: na mo h+aum gis gzi byin bskyed /
NK087(shu)006:80: zhi ba ltar nyams su len na /
NK087(shu)006:81: rang gi spyi bo la sogs par rigs lnga yab yum bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:83: rang gi mig la sogs pa'i rtsa nang du /
NK087(shu)006:84: nang gi sems dpa' yab yum bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:86: mig la sogs pa'i phyir phyi'i sems dpa' yab yum bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:88: yan lag bzhi la sgo ba yab yum bzhi bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:90: snying kha dang sogs phrag gnyis su kun bzang yab yum bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:93: lkog ma snying ga lte ba gsang gnas rkang mthil du /
NK087(shu)006:96: ye shes lha'i thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul /
NK087(shu)006:98: bdag gi lus ngag gi sgrib pa dang lta ba dman pa'i sgrib pa dag par bsam /
NK087(shu)006:101: de ni zhi ba'i lam khyer ro //
NK087(shu)006:103: khro bo'i lam du khyer ba ni /
NK087(shu)006:104: gdams ngag ltar du dbang chen gyi dal dang /
NK087(shu)006:105: mgo bo dang sha rus la sogs pa lus khro bo'i gzhal yas khang du bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:106: lus la lha dgod lugs ni /
NK087(shu)006:107: rang gi lus spyi che mchog tu gsal /
NK087(shu)006:109: a kra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka h+aum /
NK087(shu)006:110: ka ta ma h+aa kro d+hi shwa ri h+aum /
NK087(shu)006:111: ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h+aum /
NK087(shu)006:113: ru tra rnam gsum la h+aum dgu bzlas /
NK087(shu)006:114: he ru ka dgu klong du bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:116: badz+ra sh+r+ai he ru ka /badz+ra ma h+aa kro d+hi shwa ri h+aum /
NK087(shu)006:117: +amo ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h+aum /
NK087(shu)006:119: badz+ra he ru ka mtsher pa la bsam /
NK087(shu)006:120: bud+d+ha he ru ka grod pa la bsam /
NK087(shu)006:124: lte ba sprul pa'i tsakra bang rim bzhir bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:125: snying ga chos kyi tsakra bum pa /
NK087(shu)006:126: mgrin pa longs spyod kyi tsakra bre dang 'khor lo rim pa bcu gsum bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:127: spyi gtsug bde chen gyi tsakra mchod rten gyi gdugs su bsgom //
NK087(shu)006:128: rtsa kun d+harma sbom phra mda' smyug tsam pa mchod rten gyi srog shing du bsam /
NK087(shu)006:129: spyi bo'i steng du yi ge ham gi rang bzhin thig le sran ma tsam zhig bsam /
NK087(shu)006:130: thig le de nyid yongs su gyur pa las bla ma gdugs kyi tog tu bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:131: de'i ngang las ma g.yengs par yi dam lha'i snying po skyel tshad du bzlas /
NK087(shu)006:132: de la shes pa gtad de bsgoms pas bla ma
NK087(shu)006:133: dang tsakra 'od du zhu nas sems nyid kyi dngos
NK087(shu)006:134: po yod dam snyam pa dang rug gi 'dres pa'i
NK087(shu)006:135: ngang la blo bsgyur la bzhag go //
NK087(shu)006:136: gzugs snang zab sgrogs snying po can /
NK087(shu)006:137: mchod gnas yid brten dam pa'i chos //
NK087(shu)006:138: 'gro mgon rdo rje sems dpas gsungs //
NK087(shu)006:140: theg pa las a nu'i theg pa /
NK087(shu)006:141: lha las kun tu bzang po dang /
NK087(shu)006:142: che mchog gang gsal du bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:144: +amo gu h+ya dz+ny+aa na bo d+hi tsit+ta ma h+aa su kha h+aum h+aum h+aum /
NK087(shu)006:146: rang gi snying gi dkyil du thig le kha dog dkar po lcog sgong tsam zhig bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:147: de skar mda' 'pho ba'i tshul du spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'od du 'phos te /
NK087(shu)006:148: theg le gcig las thig phran rnams 'dus nas thig
NK087(shu)006:149: le gzhi ma la thim nas dbyings dang ye shes
NK087(shu)006:150: gnyis su med pa'i ngang la blo gnas par bya'o
NK087(shu)006:151: // gsang dbang la lha kun tu bzang mo bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:153: sh+r+ai badz+ra bo d+hi ma h+aa su kha h+aum ho /
NK087(shu)006:157: as snang srid thams cad skye med du ngo sprad /
NK087(shu)006:158: gyis 'ga' med du ngo sprad do //
NK087(shu)006:159: rig 'dzin la bsgom thabs brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams bsgom /
NK087(shu)006:161: ma h+aa sha ri ram gyi li h+aum /
NK087(shu)006:162: gdams ngag ni chos thams cad sems su ngo sprad /
NK087(shu)006:163: sems chos nyid du ngo sprad /
NK087(shu)006:164: chos nyid bde ba chen por ngo sprad /
NK087(shu)006:165: de yang rig 'dzin gong ma gong ma 'od du
NK087(shu)006:166: zhu nas 'og ma 'og ma la thim par bsam
NK087(shu)006:167: / de yang 'od kyi rang bzhin rang gi spyi
NK087(shu)006:168: bo'i gtsug tu thim pas lus ngag yid gsum gyi
NK087(shu)006:169: sdig sgrib bya sgro mes bshur ba bzhin nam na
NK087(shu)006:170: bun rdzis bskyod pa bzhin song bar bsam /
NK087(shu)006:171: de yang lus shel sgong dag pa lta bur bsam mo //
NK087(shu)006:172: 'dus pa mdo'i lag len chog khrigs yi ger bkod pa'o //
